text: for your recent order with AT&T for the DIRECTV SELECT Package
with up to 6 mbps (megabytes per second) internet speed!
You must be eagerly awaiting for your service to be activated.
We want you to have everything you need for a smooth installation experience
so you may begin enjoying the DIRECTV SELECT Package and High Speed Internet services right away!
Kindly note that your installation is scheduled for May 20th, 2016 between the hours of  9:00 AM and 11:00 AM.
Please ensure that a member of your household over the age of 18 will be present at the time of your installation.
Our professional technician will perform a site evaluation to ensure
that there are no obstructions that would prevent him from performing the installation required.
As a friendly reminder, the actual installation work might extend beyond the scheduled window
of time and typically ranges anywhere from 2 to 5 hours
Should you need to reschedule the installation, please contact us at least 48 hours prior to your installation appointment.
Alternatively, you may check your installation appointment time by logging into www.att.com.
Checking on the details or status of your order is quick and easy with our online order status tool at www.att.com/uverseorderstatus
